text: the product came highly recommended .
this is not an inexpensive product , especially for a chrome book but , i figured you get what you pay for .
yay amazon customer service they replaced it immediately for me no questions asked .
the second one arrived , i had it from end of may june , to september started to notice the a key was a bit unresponsive at times .
it gets rave reviews both on the ' net and amazon .
in many ways , the computer has lived up to my expectations .
it is the nicest chrome computer i have ever owned .
it has one serious flaw though which is that the audio out can not drive headphones ( or earbuds ) adequately .
even with the volume turned up all the way , the sound is very low which means that you have a poor soundstage .
the one star is for warranty support .
after about 60 days use the power adapter / charger stopped working .
- i love the chromebook overall
- it freezes up depending on the program you use and you have to restart it .
- battery sucks .
- horrible customer service .
build quality is excellent ( was .
online support from asus says they only repair not replace .
this is my 3rd chromebook and it is , by far , the flakiest one i ' ve had .
the bluetooth on it drops connections on a regular basis and the wifi is slow , slow , slow to connect on a regular basis .
the space bar on the keyboard is inconsistent .
works great as a chromebook but chromebooks are still very limited for android compatibility , at least this one is .
my main gripe is incompatibility with amazon prime videos and gogo .
about half of my home automation apps also do not work .
it works well for internet browsing and e - mail but i was hoping for much more .
i also hate the square rather than rounded edges .
this makes it uncomfortable holding it in tablet mode .
maybe i just got a lemon , but i decided to return this product after having it for less than two hours .
as a computer , for typing and using internet in general , this computer is good .
however , for using it as a tablet / computer with streaming , it seems to only work half the time .
netflix and hulu seem to be working for the most part so far , but amazon prime and xfinity stream are both having issues .
i have had the computer for four months , and my computer suddenly wo n ' t turn .
so i call asus customer support , and received some of the worst customer service ever .
the computer is great , but the charger is garbage .
it was terrible .
so a for the computer , f for the charger , and a d for the customer support .
very odd operating system .
great except came with a bad left hinge .
asus support seems to want to make this an accidental damage instead of warranty .
i can ' t recommend purchasing this based on what happens if you need support .
the build quality , screen and keyboard are terrific .
unfortunately , the downfall for me are the speakers .
they just don ' t get loud enough and that ' s crucial for me since i watch a lot of youtube and listen to music while doing other things on the machine .
it surfs the internet fast .
the touch screen broke four months after i purchased it .
the key board and mouse pad are not very sensitive .
the sound and screen quality is low .
disappointing battery life , even with light use i have to recharge every 4 - 5 hours ( at best ) .
relatively small screen with high resolution makes reading the screen difficult .
android ` ` the computer will recognize your cellphone ` ` system never works .
otherwise , build quality is very good , starts quickly , very light .
when it works it ' s a great device .
sadly after barely a year old it crashes all the time , the touch screen rarely works , and the track pad stops working until a reboot on occasion .
asus support is responsive but ineffective .
i will never buy another asus after this experience .
i bought this less than 6 months ago , and now it won ' t charge unless it ' s asleep .
it ' s basically a useless brick , with shoddy hardware .
the computer is nice , blah blah it has nice features but it stops working after a few months .
don ' t let them scam you .
oh and the customer service is garbage .
great little machine while it was functioning 100 % .
very unsatisfied with warranty service .
my shiny speedy asus chromebook froze after only one month of use and i am returning it today for a full refund .
cursor won ' t move and touchscreen won ' t work and from reading about this online i am not alone with this issue .
product worked great until it randomly stopped charging .
extremely disappointed as this was a gift to my husband .
i bought this chrome book based on the high ratings , however i feel the quality just is n ' t up to par for the price i paid .
today , it stopped powering on .
i ' ve been chatting with asus support for the past half hour and they make the sloth from zootopia look speedy .
so sad to report that after only a few weeks my asus chromebook has a hairline fracture .
the touch screen never seemed to work properly and now i understand why .
this one is pretty , but obviously not sturdy .
this was a splurge for myself , which i rarely do , and i ' m so disappointed that it turned out like this .
this is a great machine in many ways - - and with crouton could run full ubuntu , which made it a great little machine to write code on and deploy to a server .
nice screen , nice feel .

i love the way it looks and feels the only thing i can complain about is the fact that none of these electronics come with printed manuels anymore also dont know anything about the camera only see me .
overall this chromebook worked well and was reliable .
the wifi card recently died after 14 months .
now , my wifi connectivity goes up and down with regularity .
not super confident this asus unit will last half that long .
it ' s not worth what i paid for it .
i will never buy an apple product again .
beautiful machine .
app game ( simpsons tapped out ) ( i know don ' t judge ) lags at every moment .
chromebook is 2 months old and charger stopped working .
called customer service twice only to learn that i need to return old charger ( i pay $ 15 to return ) .
there is a buzzing sound that comes from inside of the keyboard .
excellent product , feels like quality all the way around .
product keyboard just stopped working after 6 months of use - called asus , and you have to ship it off for a two weeks repair .
the chromebook seems to be working fine now and my daughter does love it .
this is exactly what i needed in a laptop .
however , the speakers are already starting to crackle , and i haven ' t even had the thing for a week .
i still love the laptop , i ' m just a bit disappointed by this and i hope it ' s the only issue i see .
the battery is far below what i expected .
this computer seemed very exciting but after having troubles with 3 of them i give up .
moreover i ' m quite upset because it seems amazon will not pay me back the shipping fees , which for me amount to about 100 $ as i live in france .
the track pad has now stopped working .
it is my only device with this issue in my home .
i think it works well except for the wifi which is spotty .
it keeps disconnecting .
in total , it took 4 updates to access the google play store - - completely unacceptable !
up until this point , asus chromebooks have been my favorite .
i chose this device because of its power , app store , and a few other features trading off the option for an onboard stylus and improved screen resolution .
it also has a great backlit keyboard .
i love how i can charge my laptop on both sides of the device .
wifi sketchy to nonexistent .
i much suspect that google ' s half baked sustem is at fault .
i liked the look , the speed , and the quality of the device but two had problems and not giving it a 3rd try .
it ' s great other than the weak speakers and the touchpad .
not only is the touchpad not great in use but it also feels poorly made .
i have been happy with this purchase .
10 months in my battery will no longer charge .
the first week i had my chromebook it locked up .
bought this specific unit because quality is well reviewed here and online albeit at 2x average chrome book price .
look and feel of asus unit seems high quality but keyboard failed in 45 days .
i opened the box after ordering on black friday , and the machine wouldn ' t charge .
the battery stopped charging after 3 months .
customer service is difficult .
also battery life is max 8 hours , not 10 .

however , the resolution could be higher , the scaling is bad , the colors are a bit washy , the weight is off as said earlier , the keys are kinda awkward , travel could be more , and the keys start squeaking soon after use
this product is built well , but it won ' t run the one android app i hoped it would run , and for whatever reason the app and os update download speeds are abysmal .

labels.aspect: app and os update download speeds

the laptop itself seemed fine at first .
but the backlit keyboard was no longer lighting - up and the computer would no longer turn - on or boot .
i left it plugged in to charge for the night and tried it again the next morning , with the same results of not being able to turn it back on .

at this point i no longer trusted this model and was afraid of having the same issue with a replacement if i exchanged it , and then not having enough time to do another exchange and still be able to charge and configure it in time to wrap and put under the christmas tree for my son , so i contacted amazon and they gladly e - mailed me a return shipping label and refunded my money in full in 3 days , after receiving it back from me .

i hate to knock acer as they ' re the only brand i ' ve ever purchased and this is the first major issue i ' ve ever had with them , but it was frustrating spending that much time charging and almost finishing the configurations and set - up of a brand - new product and then not being able to turn it on to use it .
then i called amazon - acer again , the customer service was good !
overall this is a very capable machine , better life is great as well .

but the battery was giving erroneous feedback and getting too hot while charging , the keyboard was way too sensitive for me , and the cover / lid was a really cheaply made .
